More PAL MR rares.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2007 Topics (Year of the Goldfish Bowl): More PAL MR rares.
By alphamone on Friday, March 2, 2007 - 07:52 pm:

i looked at a rare list, and found that two cds from the US kist matched the PAL list.

poison is able to be produced by the same subcode data in both the PAL version and the US version.

however, the second case is more complex. the subcode data posted for happy mask shrines the rare tiger white hound.

By alphamone on Friday, March 2, 2007 - 07:53 pm:

that is, the US subcode for happy mask makes a white hound in the PAL version. just to be clear.

By alphamone on Saturday, March 3, 2007 - 04:12 pm:

also, just so you know, the code for nirvana nevermind that makes swimmer in the NTSC version is NOT the code that makes cinderbird in the PAL version.

if anyone here that has the PAL version has found cinderbird, could they please send me the subcode for it.
